name: SKEDADDLE: ROBIN HOOD
description:
An escape room game.

Play as Robin Hood and one of his merry man and try to get the contents of the vault before you're found out.

Best to be played with 2 players.

Player 1 uses keyboard or a controller.  Player 2 uses the mouse.

Player one goes around the room trying to solve puzzles and open vaults. Player two does their best at a block puzzle in order to add time to the clock.

Work together an do your best.
